## policyIsResourcePolicy variable

Type guard to check if a [Policy](./core.policy.md) is a [ResourcePolicy](./core.resourcepolicy.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
policyIsResourcePolicy: (policy: Policy) => policy is ResourcePolicy
```
